definition[1]: someone whose job is to feed, clean, and take care of horses
definition[2]: to clean and brush an animal, especially a horse
definition[3]: to prepare someone for an important job or position in society by training them over a long period
example[0]: Tim was being groomed for a managerial position.
example[1]: Clare’s been groomed to take her father’s place when he retires.
definition[4]: to take care of your own appearance by keeping your hair and clothes clean and tidy
example[2]: Her hair is always perfectly groomed.
definition[5]: to develop a friendship with a child, with the intention of starting a sexual relationship. This is done by adults, and is illegal when the child is younger than 16.
definition[6]: if an animal grooms itself or another animal, it cleans its own fur and skin or that of the other animal
